caller_intent: Confirm whether an annual EFT payment for a newly added vehicle on a policy (801.1349692) will automatically draft on the due date or require manual input.
resolution_steps: Agent verifies the policy details for Clay Adams (801.1349692).
Agent explains that the EFT is set to draft automatically on the due date as it is configured as annual EFT.
Caller confirms understanding and ends the call.
knowledge_required: Understanding of EFT payment configurations for policy additions
Ability to check policy details via internal systems (e.g., 'big summary screen')
systems_referenced: internal policy management system (referred to as 'big summary screen')
summary: Jeremy Palmer, an Alliance Insurance agent, confirmed with Personal Lines Billing that an annual EFT for a vehicle addition on policy 801.1349692 would automatically draft on the due date. The agent verified this via the policy's summary screen, resolving the caller's query.
